verbs.description: [ARGM-ADV: < p >] [ARG0: Sen . Lindsey Graham] [V: said] [ARG1: President Trump " probably " should n't use the term " spygate " to refer to the FBI 's use of an informant in the Russia probe.</p] >
< p > Sen . Lindsey Graham said President Trump " probably " [V: should] n't use the term " spygate " to refer to the FBI 's use of an informant in the Russia probe.</p >

< p > Sen . Lindsey Graham said [ARG0: President Trump] " [ARGM-ADV: probably] " [ARGM-MOD: should] [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: use] [ARG1: the term " spygate "] [ARG2: to refer to the FBI 's use of an informant in the Russia] probe.</p >
< p > Sen . Lindsey Graham said [ARG0: President Trump] " probably " should n't use the term " spygate " to [V: refer] [ARG1: to the FBI 's use of an informant in the Russia] probe.</p >
